titleStmt.title: A view of a printed book intituled Observations upon His Majesties late answers and expresses.
titleStmt.author: Spelman, John, Sir, 1594-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Liechfield [sic], printer to the University.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Spelman by Wing.
The imprint is false; a London counterfeit -- Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
